lessons.name: Introduction to Programming and C
lessons.intro: In this lesson, you'll learn the fundamentals of programming and why C is a foundational language in modern computing.
lessons.topics: History of C, Setting up the environment, Writing your first C program.

lessons.name: Basic Syntax
lessons.intro: Understanding the basic syntax of C is essential to write correct programs and avoid common mistakes.
lessons.topics: Variables, Data types, Operators, and Expressions.

lessons.name: Arrays and Strings
lessons.intro: Arrays and strings are critical to handling large data sets efficiently in C programs.
lessons.topics: Declaring arrays, Multidimensional arrays, String manipulation.

lessons.name: Pointers
lessons.intro: Pointers allow you to manage memory and deal with dynamic data structures efficiently.
lessons.topics: Pointer basics, Pointer arithmetic, Pointers with arrays.
